data.title: Crum & Forster Insurance
data.meta_description: Crum & Forster provides market-leading property & casualty, accident & health and specialty insurance solutions. A true underwriting company, we have a 200-year history of helping our customers manage risk with laser-focused expertise, integrity and discipline. Our people are empowered to make decisions and problem-solve with you smartly and swiftly.
data.text:
Crum & Forster

Recognized as a Great Place to Work

Crum & Forster has been Certified™ by Great Place to Work® for our employee-first focus and our steadfast commitment to diversity, equity and inclusion, among other factors. This prestigious award is based entirely on what current employees say about their experience working at C&F. In 2022, 94% of C&F’s nearly 2,500 U.S. employees participating in the survey said the company is a great place to work – 57 percentage points higher than the average U.S. company.

Read More »

C&F in Action

Corporate Social Responsibility

Crum & Forster has an unwavering commitment to supporting the communities where our employees live and work. Importantly, we believe in “doing well by doing good.”

Through our many corporate and employee-led charitable giving; volunteering; commitment to diversity, equity and inclusion; and employee wellness initiatives, we seek to drive positive change among the many diverse groups we serve. To learn more about these efforts, please see our 2022 Social Impact Highlights.

Read More »

Belonging@C&F

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

It is our mission to attract, retain and support talent that is representative of different life experiences and educational levels, genders, races, sexual orientations, abilities, age groups, cultures, religions and other backgrounds.

Through Belonging@C&F, our leadership and employees work collaboratively to share experiences, expand opportunities, and continue to increase Diversity, Equity & Inclusion throughout our organization. We encourage and enable all of our colleagues to bring their authentic selves to work and achieve their full potential.

Read More »

Celebrating 200 Years

C&F’s journey is characterized by innovation, perseverance and commitment to people

Since 1822, when Captain Richard Whiley formed The North River Insurance Company (the foundation of Crum & Forster), C&F has enjoyed a long history of providing market-leading insurance solutions, building and maintaining scores of lasting partnerships and creating an enduring legacy of corporate social responsibility initiatives.

Take a look back at key events in C&F’s 200-year history.

Read More »
